mapper.select: SELECT * FROM chat_participant WHERE chat_room_id = #{chatRoomId} AND user_id = #{userId}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO chat_participant (chat_room_id, user_id, created_at, has_entered) VALUES (#{chatRoomId}, #{userId}, NOW(), #{hasEntered})
mapper.delete: DELETE FROM chat_participant WHERE chat_room_id = #{chatRoomId} AND user_id = #{userId}
mapper.select: SELECT cp1.chat_room_id FROM chat_participant cp1 JOIN chat_participant cp2 ON cp1.chat_room_id = cp2.chat_room_id JOIN chat_room cr ON cr.chat_room_id = cp1.chat_room_id WHERE cp1.user_id = #{userId1} AND cp2.user_id = #{userId2} AND cr.is_group_chat = 'N' LIMIT 1
